DOC.detailed_description: Tapentadol hydrochloride centrally active analgesic ( antinociceptive ) compound . This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , parallel-group , placebo- active-controlled dose study men nonpregnant , nonlactating woman . The patient least 18 75 year age experience moderate severe pain within 9 hour removal postoperative analgesia . The surgery standardize first metatarsal bunionectomy . Treatment postsurgical pain 9 hr period either placebo , tapentadol , oxycodone use various dose regimen . The primary objective study evaluate efficacy safety treatment total pain relief total change pain intensity 12 hour report adverse event , laboratory value , vital sign , ECGs . Secondary objective include evaluation several pain measure , drug pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics . Six patient treatment group receive study medication orally 0 , 4 , 8 hour one follow dose regimen : 1 ) placebo , placebo , placebo , 2 ) 93 mg , 93 mg , 93 mg tapentadol IR , 3 ) 140 mg , 140 mg , 140 mg tapentadol IR , 4 ) 140 mg , 70 mg , 70 mg tapentadol IR , 5 ) 186 mg , 93 mg , 93 mg tapentadol IR , 6 ) 10 mg , 10 mg , 10 mg oxycodone IR .
